course_description: This longitudinal course spans the entire four years of the MD program & is designed to teach students the knowledge, skills, attitudes & behaviors necessary to become competent, ethical & caring physicians. Through interactive discussion, case analysis & role play in small group sessions, along with experiential learning by practicing on each other & with patients, both standardized & real, students will attain the clinical & diagnostic skills they will need to take excellent care of patients.
